main event: A bright light resembling a large fluorescent bulb was observed in Munhall, Pennsylvania in May 1964.
interesting points: The light was accompanied by a whistling sound., The object entered from the northeast and was estimated to be 50 feet above a maple tree., The object appeared larger and brighter than any shooting star., It was described as having a blue-white glow with a burning orange bottom., The witness attempted to approach the site the following day but found no physical evidence.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
